case.title: on-going friendship fun and cuddles - 54 (London)
case.text:
Hello,
I am happily single and living alone, and have been for a few years now.
I do miss nice female company, I am safe, educated older than most that seem to post on here, but why not give it a try I though.
If your interested in an on-going light hearted, tactile friendship with a mautre white male, fifties who is open minded, easy going, clean and clean shaven.
Like the usual things in life I would like to hear from you.
I will not write to your email address until I am comfortable and feel your genuine.
I am open minded about race, age etc but nice to have something in common.
I am 5ft 10 - 11 stocky build and a light smoker
